alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 29 at 12:30PM PST until January 30 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 21 expected. * WHERE...The Douglas, Coos, and Curry county coast, including Bandon, North Bend, Coos Bay, Lakeside, Reedsport, Denmark, Sixes, Port Orford, Gold Beach, and Brookings. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
